title: Phishing Attempts
extract: Phishing is the fraudulent attempt to obtain sensitive information such as usernames, passwords and credit card details by disguising as a trustworthy entity in an electronic communication. ... Phishing is an example of social engineering techniques being used to deceive users.
extract_html: Phishing is the fraudulent attempt to obtain sensitive information such as usernames, passwords and credit card details by disguising as a trustworthy entity in an electronic communication. ... Phishing is an example of social engineering techniques being used to deceive users.
